text.0: Cookies help us improve our website. By clicking 'Accept,' you agree to our use of cookies for functionality, analytics, and personalized content. Learn more in our

0.text: We start by talking to you about your goals and vision. This ensures we're on the same page and can deliver what you're looking for.
0.subtitle: You get a clear understanding and aligned expectations from the start.

1.text: We create a plan that outlines the concept, steps, and timeline. This keeps you informed about what we're doing and when.
1.subtitle: You enjoy the clarity of the process and confidence in the plan.

2.text: We take the idea and turn it into a video, animation, or model, bringing your vision to life.
2.subtitle: You get a draft of your idea that you can try and review.

3.text: You give us feedback on the draft, and we make the necessary changes to get it just right.
3.subtitle: You enjoy a final product that meets your needs and looks great.

4.text: We help you share your content in the best places to reach your audience.
4.subtitle: Your video gets seen by the right people, maximising its impact.

5.text: We keep all your data, style elements, and identity on file to ensure consistency across all your products. No matter when you order your next one, it will be perfectly aligned with your brand.

0.title: Extensive expertise
0.text: Our team has a wealth of knowledge and experience in various digital fields, ensuring we deliver innovative and effective video production services.

1.title: Top talents
1.text: We have assembled a team of highly skilled professionals who are passionate about creating outstanding video content that stands out.

2.title: Comprehensive approach
2.text: From consulting and strategy to production and distribution, we handle every aspect of the process to ensure a seamless and successful project.

3.title: Guaranteed quality
3.text: We promise that our products will match top industry standards, providing you with high-quality content that you can be proud of.

4.title: Market research
4.text: We thoroughly research the market and understand your audience's needs to craft a product that not only looks great but also effectively boosts your brand.

5.title: Product Consistency
5.text: We keep all your data, style elements, and identity on file to ensure consistency across all your products. No matter when you order your next one, it will be perfectly aligned with your brand.

description.0: Review your selected services and products below.

payment.title: PAYMENT METHOD
payment.subtitle: Direct wire transfer
payment.description: Make your payment directly into our bank account. Please use your Order ID as the payment reference. Your order will not be processed until the funds have cleared in our account.

description.0: We're here to help you find the perfect solution.
description.1: Fill out the form below, and we'll provide a tailored

hero.text: Before filling out the form, download and take a look at our pricing guide to understand the range of services we offer and their associated costs.

description.0: Please fill out the form to help us

hero.title: Experience the magic of ideas in motion
hero.subtitle: In user interfaces, videos, 3D models and animations.

examples.description: Discover how our expertly crafted videos skyrocket your ideas, transforming concepts into captivating visuals that engage and inspire. Explore our portfolio to see the impact of high-quality production on your personal brand.

threeDModeling.description: Explore how our 3D modelling services bring your ideas to life with stunning precision and detail. Dive into our portfolio to see how we transform concepts into dynamic, realistic models that elevate your projects and captivate your audience.

videoDescription.1: Elegant Ring with a Stunning Gemstone
videoDescription.3: Perfectly Hold Your Eggs with Style

uiUxExamples.description: Discover the impact of our UX/UI design services, where user experience meets stunning visual design. Browse our portfolio to see how we create intuitive, engaging interfaces that bring your ideas to life and enhance user satisfaction.

animationsExamples.title: ANIMATIONS
animationsExamples.description: Experience the magic of our animation services, where imagination meets motion. Explore our portfolio to see how we bring ideas to life with dynamic and captivating animations that engage and inspire your audience.

0.text: Experience a dynamic Neon preloader featuring two rotating circles, each moving in opposite directions. Watch as the inner circle morphs shapes while the vibrant colours shift with every rotation.

1.text: Enjoy the elegant animation of text gracefully appearing letter by letter on the screen, ensuring readability at a comfortable pace for adults to absorb each word with clarity.

2.text: Discover an animated hover button adorned with a gradient from violet to pink. Upon hovering, witness its transformation to a serene lagoon blue, adding interactive charm and elegance to your interface.

3.text: Behold a captivating preloader featuring a lively red ball bouncing energetically against a subdued grey backdrop. Its rhythmic motion signals ongoing activity.

4.text: Watch a neon pink heart sketch elegantly form on the screen. It begins to pulsate with a gentle rhythm and sends vibrant waves of neon colours, filling the screen with affection and energy.

requestBlock.text: Contact us to find the perfect fit for your idea.

errors.invalidEmail: Please provide a correct email address.

description.0: Your request has been received successfully!
description.1: One of our team members will get in touch with you shortly.

hero.title: Creative minds behind Modellist Digital
hero.description: At The Modellist, our small but dedicated team works tirelessly to transform your ideas into stunning visuals. Each member is crucial in ensuring creativity, quality, and precision in every aspect of our services. Discover the key roles that make our magic happen:

tab1.description1: The driving force behind the innovative concepts and designs we produce. They ensure that every project, whether it's a 3D model, video production, animation, or UX/UI design, is both functional and aesthetically captivating, pushing the boundaries of creativity.
tab1.description2: Translates ideas into visual masterpieces. They oversee the design process, ensuring that each creation meets our high standards and aligns with your vision.

tab2.description1: Crafts compelling stories around our creations, showcasing their unique value and potential. They connect our products with the right audience, ensuring our models, videos, animations, and designs make a lasting impact.
tab2.description2: Dedicated to providing top-notch service. They guide you through the process, ensuring your needs are met and your expectations exceeded.

tab3.description1: Meticulously reviews every project to ensure it meets our rigorous quality standards. They are the guardians of precision and detail, making sure that each creation is flawless and ready for presentation.
tab3.description2: Ensures that all our models and animations are technically sound and optimised for their respective platforms. They tackle the complexities of construction and production, ensuring durability and functionality.

tab4.description1: Brings ideas to life with their expert skills in creating detailed and accurate 3D models.
tab4.description2: Brings motion to our creative projects, crafting fluid and engaging animations that capture the essence of your vision.
tab4.description3: Oversees the creation of video content from start to finish.
tab4.description4: Ensures that all our digital products are user-friendly and visually appealing.
